backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing product, customer, cart, and order types with access control, image storage mixin, and in-memory maps for catalog and ordering workflows.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old product records to new product format with description and image fields, preserving product IDs and nextProductId.
feature_evidence.json: Report listing implemented features, associated frontend files, components, and test coverage for admin product management and data persistence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-generated summaries of many frontend files describing UI components, pages, configuration, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styles defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base theming.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point configuring metadata, fonts, and mounting the root React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router and providers setup handling app-wide routing, authentication gates, and page selection.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button using Internet Identity with loading states and error handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Authorization gate that checks admin status and shows loading or access-denied UI before rendering admin content.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Wrapper that checks Internet Identity authentication and shows loading or login prompts before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRegi: Ensures a user has a completed customer profile, displaying loading or registration prompts before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/landing/About.ts: Renders the About section with features and descriptive content about Farmgrewâ€™s offerings.
frontend/src/components/landing/DietPlan: Displays selectable vegetarian diet plans with icons, benefits, and descriptions using data from dietPlans.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Footer section with branding, quick navigation links, contact info, and scroll-to-section behavior.
frontend/src/components/landing/Hero.tsx: Hero section with headline, call-to-action buttons, decorative visuals, and scroll-to-section functionality.
frontend/src/components/landing/Nutritio: Provides a nutrition calculator UI that manages a basket of food items, pre-fills based on diet plans, computes totals, and integrates with backend products and cart actions.
frontend/src/components/landing/Recommen: Displays AI-driven product recommendations based on selected goals and dietary preferences, updating automatically when linked diet plans change.
frontend/src/components/landing/ServiceA: Shows current and upcoming service locations with styled cards highlighting Chennai and future expansion.
frontend/src/components/landing/TopNav.t: Implements the top navigation bar with routing, scrolling to sections, cart count display, admin links, and responsive mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/Container: Simple layout wrapper that centers content with responsive horizontal padding.
frontend/src/components/shop/CategoryFil: Renders a tab-based category filter allowing users to switch product categories.
frontend/src/components/shop/ProductCard: Displays product details with image fallback logic and handles add-to-cart actions with authentication checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor that updates with identity changes and refreshes dependent queries accordingly.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProducts.ts: Provides React Query hooks for admin product actions including listing, creating, updating, deleting, and image uploads.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Implements cart management hooks for fetching the cart and modifying items via actor API calls.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomer.ts: Contains hooks to fetch the customer profile and register new customers using actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines an Internet Identity context and provider for authentication with login, logout, and identity loading logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrders.ts: Provides hooks to fetch user orders, fetch a specific order, and place new orders while invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Exports hooks to fetch product lists or individual products using the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS config defining design tokens, dark mode variables, and utility classes.
frontend/src/lib/dietPlans.ts: Defines static diet plan data with descriptions, benefits, and focus areas.
frontend/src/lib/nutritionData.ts: Provides nutrition item definitions, sample data, and a function to calculate macro totals for basket items.
frontend/src/lib/productImage.ts: Generates product image URLs based on normalized names and provides a fallback SVG image.
frontend/src/lib/recommendationsData.ts: Defines nutrition goals, dietary preferences, recommendation types, and a database plus filtering logic for generating item recommendations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up the React app root with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Provides an admin interface to create, edit, and delete products with image upload, form validation, and product listing.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the user's cart, allows quantity updates and item removal, calculates totals, and submits orders.
frontend/src/pages/OrderDetailsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays details for a specific order, including items, status, and timestamps.
frontend/src/pages/OrdersPage.tsx: Lists all user orders with status, date, and total, and links to individual order detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/RegisterPage.tsx: Registration and profile update page that loads customer data, submits registration, and shows success or loading states.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Displays products with category filtering, loading/error handling, and product grid rendering.
frontend/src/router/navigation.ts: Provides simple client-side navigation and route activity checking using history API.
frontend/src/router/usePathname.ts: React hook that tracks and updates the current pathname on popstate events.
frontend/src/sections/LandingPage.tsx: Landing page assembling hero, recommendations, calculator, plans, service area, and about sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: TailwindCSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing app requirements, admin module goals, and feature implementation state.
